description: "Map of Dutch colonial territory in Southeast Asia, including the administrative areas of Java and Madura. Two maritime routes are marked from Batavia to the Maluku Islands: of the brig ‘Douga’ in 1825, and by Baron Godert van der Capellen in 1824. "
title: "Kaart der Nederlandsche bezittingen in Oostindien = Possessions hollanaises aux Indes Orientales"
